DomainName.text: Domain name to set settings. MaxLength- 70

enum: MailBox for which you wish to set email forwarding. For example- example@namecheap.com

ForwardTo[1..n].text: Email address to forwardto.For example- example@gmail.com

meta.description: Sets email forwarding for a domain name.

routes.text: Sets DNS host records settings for the requested domain

SLD.text: SLD of the domain to setHosts. MaxLength- 70

TLD.text: TLD of the domain to setHosts. MaxLength- 10

HostName[1..n].text: Sub-domain/hostname to create the record for

RecordType[1..n].text: Possible values- A/ AAAA/ ALIAS/ CAA/ CNAME/ MX/ MXE/ NS/ TXT/ URL/ URL301/ FRAME

Address[1..n].text: Possible values are URL or IP address. The value for this parameter is based on RecordType.

MXPref[1..n].text: MX preference for host. Applicable for MX records only.

EmailType.text:
Possible values are-
MXE - to set up your custom MXE record.
MX - to set up custom MX records of your mail provider.
FWD - to set up MX records for our Free Email Forwarding service.
OX - to set up MX records for our Private Email service.

TTL[1..n].text:
Time to live for all record types.Possible values- any value between 60 to 60000
Default Value- 1800

Flag.text: Is an unsigned integer between 0 and 255. The flag value is an 8-bit number the most significant bit of which indicates the criticality of understanding of a record by a CA. It's recommended to use '0'

Tag.text:
A non-zero sequence of US-ASCII letters and numbers in lower case. The tag value can be one of the following values-
issue  specifies the certification authority that is authorized to issue a certificate for the domain name or subdomain record used in the title.
issuewild  specifies the certification authority that is allowed to issue a wildcard certificate for the domain name or subdomain record used in the title. The certificate applies to the domain name or subdomain directly and to all its subdomains.
iodef  specifies the e-mail address or URL (compliant with RFC 5070) a CA should use to notify a client if any issuance policy violation spotted by this CA.

meta.description: Sets DNS host records settings for the requested domain.

routes.text: Transfers a domain to Namecheap

Years.text: Though it is possible to configure a transfer price up to 10 years the duration should be set to 1 year only. MaxLength- 1

EPPCode.text: The EPPCode is required for transferring .biz; .ca; .cc; .co; .com; .com.pe; .in; .info; .me; .mobi; .net; net.pe; .org; .org.pe; .pe; .tv; .us domains only. MaxLength- 20

AddFreeWhoisguard.text: Adds free domain privacy for the domain. MaxLength- 3 Default Value- Yes

WGenable.text: Enables free domain privacy for the domain. MaxLength- 3 Default Value- No

meta.description: Transfers a domain to Namecheap. You can only transfer .biz, .ca, .cc, .co, .co.uk, .com, .com.es, .com.pe, .es, .in, .info, .me, .me.uk, .mobi, .net, .net.pe, .nom.es, .org, .org.es, .org.pe, .org.uk, .pe, .tv, .us domains through API at this time.

Resubmit.text: The value 'true' resubmits the transfer. MaxLength- 5

routes.text: Gets the list of domain transfers

ListType.text: Possible values are ALL/INPROGRESS/ CANCELLED/COMPLETED. Default Value- ALL MaxLength- 10

SearchTerm.text: The keyword should be a domain name. MaxLength- 70

Page.text: Page to return. Default Value- 1 MaxLength- 10

PageSize.text:
Number of transfer to be listed on a page. Minimum value- 10; Maximum value- 100
Default Value- 10 MaxLength- 10

SortBy.text: Possible values are DOMAINNAME/ DOMAINNAME_DESC/TRANSFERDATE/ TRANSFERDATE_DESC/STATUSDATE/ STATUSDATE_DESC. Default Value- DOMAINNAME MaxLength- 50

meta.description: Gets the list of domain transfers.

routes.text: Gets the status of add funds request

TokenId.text: The Unique ID that you received after calling namecheap.users.createaddfundsrequest method. MaxLength- 100

meta.description: Gets the status of add funds request

routes.text: Creates a new account at NameCheap under this ApiUser

NewUserName.text: Username for the new user account. MaxLength- 20

NewUserPassword.text: Password for the new user account. MaxLength- 20

EmailAddress.text: Email address of the user. MaxLength- 128

IgnoreDuplicateEmailAddress.text: By default it ignores to check if the email address is already in use. Default Value- Yes. MaxLength- 10

FirstName.text: First name of the user. MaxLength- 60

LastName.text: Last name of the user. MaxLength- 60

AcceptTerms.text:
Terms of agreement. The Value should be 1 for user account creation.
Default Value- 1. MaxLength- 1

AcceptNews.text: Possible values are 0 and 1. Value should be 1 if the user wants to recieve newsletters else it should be 0. MaxLength- 1

JobTitle.text: Job designation of the user. MaxLength- 60

Zip.text: Zip/Postal code of the user. MaxLength- 15

Country.text: Two letter country code of the user. MaxLength- 2

Phone.text: Phone number in the format +NNN.NNNNNNNNNN. MaxLength- 20

Fax.text: Fax number in the format +NNN.NNNNNNNNNN. MaxLength- 20

meta.description: Creates a new account at NameCheap under this ApiUser

routes.text: Verify user account credentials with namecheap.users.create API

Password.text: Password of the user account. MaxLength- 20

meta.description: Validates the username and password of user accounts you have created using the API command namecheap.users.create.

routes.text: API sends password reset link via email

FindByValue.text: The username/email address/domain of the user. MaxLength- 20

EmailFromName.text: Enter a different value to overwrite the default value. Default Value- namecheap.com MaxLength- 20

EmailFrom.text: Enter a different value to overwrite the default value. Default Value- support@namecheap.com MaxLength- 20

URLPattern.text:
Enter a different URL to overwrite namecheap.com. Refer Example Request#2
MaxLength- 20 Default Value- http

meta.description: When you call this API, a link to reset password will be emailed to the end user's profile email id.The end user needs to click on the link to reset password.
